author: Reuters Editorial
title: India to sell bonds worth about $44 bln in April-Sept - ministry
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - India is likely to borrow 2.88 trillion rupees ($44.42 billion) through weekly bond auctions during April-September, the finance ministry said on Monday.
To view the H1 bond issue calendar, click here here %20Gsec%20-DTBs-H1_DTB-Q1-2018-19-final.pdf ($1 = 64.8400 Indian rupees) (Reporting by Vishal Sridhar in Bengaluru; Editing by Biju Dwarakanath)
